alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, western Wakulla, Gadsden, Liberty, southwestern Leon and northwestern Franklin Counties through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 352 PM EDT/252 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midway to 15 miles northwest of Carrabelle to 10 miles north of Apalachicola to 15 miles southwest of Port St. Joe. Movement was northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midway, Quincy, Port St. Joe, Tallahassee, Mexico Beach, Greensboro, Tallahassee Comm College, Wewahitchka, Orange, Gretna, Lake Bradford, Honeyville, Jewel Fire Tower, Juniper, Douglas City, Vilas, Florence, Chipola Cutoff, Central City and Cape San Blas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
